This is advanced version of my drop in image slideshow gallery. In this gallery each image is dropped into view. Slideshow will pause on mouse over. This plugin have separate image management link in the admin dashboard. From that dashboard link admin can manage the gallery images and target links. In the old drop in image slideshow p
